| History                 = The World Counterterrorism Agency or W.C.A., was formed by a large group of ex-[[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] agents, including [[Barbara Morse (Earth-616)|Barbara Morse (Mockingbird)]], following the events of the [[Secret Invasion]]. After being reunited with Barbara, [[Clinton Barton (Earth-616)|Clint Barton (Hawkeye/Ronin)]] joins the W.C.A. and fight the A.I.M. scientist [[Monica Rappaccini (Earth-616)|Monica Rappaccini]].

| Trivia                  =  * W.C.A was also the acronym for the [[Avengers West Coast (Earth-616)|Avengers West Coast]], when they called themselves the West Coast Avengers. Both Mockingbird and Hawkeye served as members of the West Coast Avengers.
